mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNO, NO, CATEGORY_NO, CATEGORY, WRITER, TITLE, CONTENT FROM ( SELECT TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(NO, 3)) NO_NUM, NO, CATEGORY_NO, CATEGORY, WRITER, TITLE, CONTENT FROM V_Y_FAQ_ARTICLES WHERE CATEGORY LIKE ('%' || #{search, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%') OR TITLE LIKE ('%' || #{search, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%') OR CONTENT LIKE ('%' || #{search, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%') ORDER BY NO_NUM DESC ) ) WHERE RNO > 10 * (#{page} - 1) AND RNO <= 10 * #{page}

SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*)/10) FROM V_Y_FAQ_ARTICLES WHERE CATEGORY LIKE ('%' || #{search, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%') OR TITLE LIKE ('%' || #{search, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%') OR CONTENT LIKE ('%' || #{search, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%')
